Name: Road Home
About the game: Road Home is a classic 2D platformer where you tries to overcome dangers and collect treasures. Combine speed, accurate jumps and different items capabilities to evade traps and enemies and find hidden places with many secrets. Each level has an alternate version with increased difficulty and rewards, which only experienced players will conquer. Challenge the dangers and find your road home!
